sentence.Network_en: Once wholesale prices are deregulated, consumer prices will also rise.
sentence.Network_cn: 一旦批发价格放开，零售价格也会随之上涨。

sentence.Network_cn: 仓储式会员店允许会员以批发价购买商品。

sentence.Network_cn: 这些纺织品被批发给零售商、时装店和其他制造商。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: originally as by whole sale 'in large quantities'

encyclopedia.content: wholesale n. 批发， 趸售 adj. 批发的， [喻] 大规模的 英英解释：名词wholesale: 1. the selling of goods to merchants; usually in large quantities for resale to consumers 动词wholesale: 1. sell in large quantities 形容词wholesale: 1. selling or related to selling goods in large quantities for resale to the consumer 2. ignoring distinctions 同义词：sweeping 副词wholesale: 1. at a wholesale price 2. o

entry.def: Wholesale is the activity of buying and selling goods in large quantities and therefore at cheaper prices, usually to shopkeepers who then sell them to the public.

example.ex: Warehouse clubs allow members to buy goods at wholesale prices...
example.tran: 仓储式会员店允许会员以批发价购买商品。

example.ex: I am in the wholesale trade.

entry.def: If something is sold wholesale, it is sold in large quantities and at cheaper prices, usually to shopkeepers.

example.ex: The fabrics are sold wholesale to retailers, fashion houses, and other manufacturers.
example.tran: 这些纺织品被批发给零售商、时装店和其他制造商。

entry.def: You use wholesale to describe the destruction, removal, or changing of something when it affects a very large number of things or people.

example.ex: They are only doing what is necessary to prevent wholesale destruction of vegetation...
example.tran: 他们只是在采取必要措施避免大规模的植被破坏。

example.ex: It was wholesale slaughter of women and children.
example.tran: 那是对妇女和儿童的大规模屠杀。

means.word_mean: 1. the selling of goods to merchants; usually in large quantities for resale to consumers
1. selling or related to selling goods in large quantities for resale to the consumer;

sentences.sentence: "I can sell it to you wholesale"

means.word_mean: 2. on a large scale without careful discrimination;

auth_sentence.content: He soon set up a small wholesale jewelry business.
auth_sentence.res_content: He soon set up a small wholesale jewelry business.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He soon set up a small wholesale jewelry business.

auth_sentence.content: Greater friction...in the retail than in the wholesale market.
auth_sentence.res_content: Greater friction...in the retail than in the wholesale market.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Greater friction...in the retail than in the wholesale market.

auth_sentence.content: The Wyckoff location also had a wholesale parts warehouse.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Wyckoff location also had a wholesale parts warehouse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Wyckoff location also had a wholesale parts warehouse.

sentences.en: the wholesale and retail distribution of a huge variety of goods
sentences.cn: 多种商品的批发和零售

sentences.en: The retail dealer buys at wholesale and sells at retail.
sentences.cn: 零售商批发购进货物,以零售价卖出。

sentences.en: She’s in the wholesale fruit trade.
They own a wholesale business in clothes.
sentences.cn: 他们经营服装批发生意。

sentences.en: Shopkeepers buy wholesale and sell retail.
sentences.cn: 小店主整批买进再零售出去。

sentences.en: What the system needs is wholesale reform.
sentences.cn: 这一体制所需要的是彻底改革。

sentences.en: Some shopkeepers closed early to prevent the wholesale destruction of their property by the hooligans.
sentences.cn: 有些店主为了防止流氓大肆破坏他们的财产而早早关门。
